description:
This course is for students who purchased the Ultimatum OpenCart theme who wants to get up and running quickly as possible. In order to takes this course, you should have basic knowledge of how to operate OpenCart before you start this course.

What you will learn

  • Ultimatum OpenCart theme installation using the File Manager from the cPanel
  • How to create text message with the embedded tool in the layer slider.
  • Set up the header section (Menus, Logo, Contact info, Delivery info)
  • Locate all the modules used for the content section (Layer Slider, Banners, Featured products, Deal of the Day, Icon Boxes, Testimonials)
  • Walk you through the footer section (Newsletter, Social icons)

By end of the video, you'll be able to create the ecommerce store that looks like the demo store.
title: Learn Ultimatum OpenCart Theme
